remarks: Define multiplication on positive reals.  Here we use a simple definition which is similar to ~ df-iplp or the definition of multiplication on positive reals in Metamath Proof Explorer.  This is as opposed to the more complicated definition of multiplication given in Section 11.2.1 of [HoTT], p.  (varies), which appears to be motivated by handling negative numbers or handling modified Dedekind cuts in which locatedness is omitted. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers, and is intended to be used only by the construction.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 29-Sep-2019.)
statement:
df-imp $p |- .P. = ( x e. P. , y e. P. |-> <. { q e. Q. | E. r e. Q. E. s e. Q. ( r e. ( 1st ` x ) /\ s e. ( 1st ` y ) /\ q = ( r .Q s ) ) } , { q e. Q. | E. r e. Q. E. s e. Q. ( r e. ( 2nd ` x ) /\ s e. ( 2nd ` y ) /\ q = ( r .Q s ) ) } >. ) $.
$d q r s x y $.
